headline: Skyworks Solutions, Inc. (SWKS): A Cheap Dividend Stock Being Targeted by Short Sellers
summary: We recently published a list of the 25 Cheap Dividend Stocks Being Targeted by Short Sellers. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Skyworks Solutions, Inc. (NASDAQ:SWKS) stands against other cheap dividend stocks. Short sellers — investors who profit from falling stock prices —are seeing a surge in success in 2025. […]
